on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] nova_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_nova_legion_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_nova_legion_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] nova_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] nova_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_nova_legion_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_nova_legion_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] nova_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - nova_legion (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_nova_legion_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - nova_legion (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_nova_legion_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - nova_legion (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - nova_legion (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into nova_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_nova_legion_member = yes } }
				mark_as_nova_legion_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into nova_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from nova_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_nova_legion_member = yes } }
				mark_as_nova_legion_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from nova_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from nova_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_nova_legion_member = yes
					FROM = { is_nova_legion_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_nova_legion_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.nova_legion_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from nova_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - nova_legion (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_nova_legion_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - nova_legion (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - nova_legion (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_nova_legion_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - nova_legion (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - big_mt (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_big_mt_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - big_mt (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes } }
				mark_as_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes } }
				mark_as_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
					FROM = { is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_boneyard_brotherhood_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.boneyard_brotherhood_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - boneyard_brotherhood (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] united_front (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_united_front_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_united_front_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] united_front (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] united_front (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_united_front_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_united_front_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] united_front (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - united_front (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_united_front_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - united_front (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_united_front_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - united_front (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - united_front (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into united_front (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_united_front_member = yes } }
				mark_as_united_front_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into united_front (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from united_front (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_united_front_member = yes } }
				mark_as_united_front_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from united_front (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from united_front (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_united_front_member = yes
					FROM = { is_united_front_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_united_front_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.united_front_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from united_front (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - united_front (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_united_front_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - united_front (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - united_front (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_united_front_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - united_front (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes } }
				mark_as_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes } }
				mark_as_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
					FROM = { is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_western_brotherhood_of_steel_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.western_brotherhood_of_steel_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - western_brotherhood_of_steel (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_caesars_legion_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_caesars_legion_member = yes
				}
			}

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] caesars_legion (on_action) exited"

		}
	}

	on_join_faction = {

				mark_as_caesars_legion_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into caesars_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from caesars_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_caesars_legion_member = yes } }
				mark_as_caesars_legion_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from caesars_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from caesars_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_caesars_legion_member = yes
					FROM = { is_caesars_legion_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_caesars_legion_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.caesars_legion_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from caesars_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - caesars_legion (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_caesars_legion_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - caesars_legion (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - caesars_legion (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_caesars_legion_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - caesars_legion (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] children_of_mexico (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_children_of_mexico_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_children_of_mexico_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] children_of_mexico (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] children_of_mexico (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_children_of_mexico_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_children_of_mexico_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] children_of_mexico (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - children_of_mexico (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_children_of_mexico_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - children_of_mexico (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_children_of_mexico_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - children_of_mexico (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - children_of_mexico (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into children_of_mexico (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_children_of_mexico_member = yes } }
				mark_as_children_of_mexico_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into children_of_mexico (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from children_of_mexico (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_children_of_mexico_member = yes } }
				mark_as_children_of_mexico_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from children_of_mexico (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from children_of_mexico (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_children_of_mexico_member = yes
					FROM = { is_children_of_mexico_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_children_of_mexico_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.children_of_mexico_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from children_of_mexico (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - children_of_mexico (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_children_of_mexico_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - children_of_mexico (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - children_of_mexico (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_children_of_mexico_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - children_of_mexico (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] children_of_the_gate (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] children_of_the_gate (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] children_of_the_gate (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] children_of_the_gate (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - children_of_the_gate (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - children_of_the_gate (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - children_of_the_gate (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - children_of_the_gate (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into children_of_the_gate (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes } }
				mark_as_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into children_of_the_gate (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from children_of_the_gate (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes } }
				mark_as_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from children_of_the_gate (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from children_of_the_gate (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
					FROM = { is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_children_of_the_gate_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.children_of_the_gate_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from children_of_the_gate (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - children_of_the_gate (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - children_of_the_gate (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - children_of_the_gate (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - children_of_the_gate (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] daikatana (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_daikatana_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_daikatana_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] daikatana (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

		}
	}

		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			}

					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - daikatana (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - daikatana (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into daikatana (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_daikatana_member = yes } }
				mark_as_daikatana_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into daikatana (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from daikatana (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_daikatana_member = yes } }
				mark_as_daikatana_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from daikatana (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from daikatana (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_daikatana_member = yes
					FROM = { is_daikatana_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_daikatana_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.daikatana_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from daikatana (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - daikatana (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_daikatana_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - daikatana (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - daikatana (on_action) examined"

				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - daikatana (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

				mark_as_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes
			}
			if = {

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into daughters_of_hecate (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from daughters_of_hecate (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes } }
				mark_as_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from daughters_of_hecate (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from daughters_of_hecate (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes
					FROM = { is_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_daughters_of_hecate_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.daughters_of_hecate_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from daughters_of_hecate (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - daughters_of_hecate (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - daughters_of_hecate (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - daughters_of_hecate (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - daughters_of_hecate (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] denver_defense_network (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_denver_defense_network_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_denver_defense_network_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] denver_defense_network (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] denver_defense_network (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_denver_defense_network_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_denver_defense_network_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] denver_defense_network (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - denver_defense_network (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_denver_defense_network_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - denver_defense_network (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_denver_defense_network_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - denver_defense_network (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - denver_defense_network (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into denver_defense_network (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_denver_defense_network_member = yes } }
				mark_as_denver_defense_network_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into denver_defense_network (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from denver_defense_network (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_denver_defense_network_member = yes } }
				mark_as_denver_defense_network_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from denver_defense_network (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from denver_defense_network (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_denver_defense_network_member = yes
					FROM = { is_denver_defense_network_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_denver_defense_network_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.denver_defense_network_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from denver_defense_network (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - denver_defense_network (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_denver_defense_network_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - denver_defense_network (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - denver_defense_network (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_denver_defense_network_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - denver_defense_network (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] earth_and_sky (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_earth_and_sky_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_earth_and_sky_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] earth_and_sky (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] earth_and_sky (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_earth_and_sky_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_earth_and_sky_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] earth_and_sky (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - earth_and_sky (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_earth_and_sky_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - earth_and_sky (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_earth_and_sky_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - earth_and_sky (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - earth_and_sky (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into earth_and_sky (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_earth_and_sky_member = yes } }
				mark_as_earth_and_sky_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into earth_and_sky (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from earth_and_sky (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_earth_and_sky_member = yes } }
				mark_as_earth_and_sky_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from earth_and_sky (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from earth_and_sky (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_earth_and_sky_member = yes
					FROM = { is_earth_and_sky_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_earth_and_sky_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.earth_and_sky_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from earth_and_sky (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - earth_and_sky (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_earth_and_sky_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - earth_and_sky (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - earth_and_sky (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_earth_and_sky_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - earth_and_sky (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_empire_of_salt_member = yes
				}

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from empire_of_salt (on_action) exited"

			if = {

				}

					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from empire_of_salt (on_action) exited"

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - empire_of_salt (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}

	on_liberate = {

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - empire_of_salt (on_action) examined"

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - empire_of_salt (on_action) finished exam"
			}

			if = {

			}
		}

		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from equestria (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_equestria_member = yes } }
				mark_as_equestria_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from equestria (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from equestria (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_equestria_member = yes
					FROM = { is_equestria_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_equestria_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.equestria_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from equestria (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - equestria (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_equestria_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - equestria (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - equestria (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_equestria_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - equestria (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] faithful (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_faithful_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_faithful_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] faithful (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] faithful (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_faithful_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_faithful_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] faithful (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - faithful (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_faithful_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - faithful (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_faithful_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - faithful (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - faithful (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into faithful (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_faithful_member = yes } }
				mark_as_faithful_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into faithful (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from faithful (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_faithful_member = yes } }
				mark_as_faithful_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from faithful (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from faithful (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_faithful_member = yes
					FROM = { is_faithful_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_faithful_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.faithful_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from faithful (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - faithful (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_faithful_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - faithful (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - faithful (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_faithful_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - faithful (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] fantasma_cartel (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_fantasma_cartel_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_fantasma_cartel_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] fantasma_cartel (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

				}

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] fantasma_cartel (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			}
			if = {

				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - fantasma_cartel (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_fantasma_cartel_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - fantasma_cartel (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - fantasma_cartel (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into fantasma_cartel (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_fantasma_cartel_member = yes } }
				mark_as_fantasma_cartel_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into fantasma_cartel (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from fantasma_cartel (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_fantasma_cartel_member = yes } }
				mark_as_fantasma_cartel_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from fantasma_cartel (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from fantasma_cartel (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_fantasma_cartel_member = yes
					FROM = { is_fantasma_cartel_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_fantasma_cartel_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.fantasma_cartel_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from fantasma_cartel (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - fantasma_cartel (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_fantasma_cartel_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - fantasma_cartel (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - fantasma_cartel (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_fantasma_cartel_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - fantasma_cartel (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			}
			if = {

				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_glass_league_member = yes
				}
			}

			if = {

				}

			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_great_federation_member = yes } }
				mark_as_great_federation_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from great_federation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from great_federation (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_great_federation_member = yes
					FROM = { is_great_federation_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_great_federation_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.great_federation_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from great_federation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - great_federation (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_great_federation_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - great_federation (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - great_federation (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_great_federation_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - great_federation (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] great_plains_federation (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_great_plains_federation_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_great_plains_federation_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] great_plains_federation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] great_plains_federation (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_great_plains_federation_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_great_plains_federation_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] great_plains_federation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - great_plains_federation (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_great_plains_federation_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - great_plains_federation (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_great_plains_federation_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - great_plains_federation (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - great_plains_federation (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into great_plains_federation (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_great_plains_federation_member = yes } }
				mark_as_great_plains_federation_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into great_plains_federation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from great_plains_federation (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_great_plains_federation_member = yes } }
				mark_as_great_plains_federation_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from great_plains_federation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from great_plains_federation (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_great_plains_federation_member = yes
					FROM = { is_great_plains_federation_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_great_plains_federation_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.great_plains_federation_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from great_plains_federation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - great_plains_federation (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_great_plains_federation_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - great_plains_federation (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - great_plains_federation (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_great_plains_federation_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - great_plains_federation (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] jungle_pact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_jungle_pact_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_jungle_pact_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] jungle_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] jungle_pact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_jungle_pact_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_jungle_pact_member = yes
				}
			}

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] jungle_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - jungle_pact (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_jungle_pact_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - jungle_pact (on_action) entered"
				}

				if = {

					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - jungle_pact (on_action) exited"
				}
			}

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - jungle_pact (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_jungle_pact_member = yes } }
				mark_as_jungle_pact_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into jungle_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from jungle_pact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_jungle_pact_member = yes } }
				mark_as_jungle_pact_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from jungle_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from jungle_pact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_jungle_pact_member = yes
					FROM = { is_jungle_pact_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_jungle_pact_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.jungle_pact_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from jungle_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - jungle_pact (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_jungle_pact_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - jungle_pact (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - jungle_pact (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_jungle_pact_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - jungle_pact (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
