			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_masters_new_army_member = yes } }
				mark_as_masters_new_army_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into masters_new_army (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from masters_new_army (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_masters_new_army_member = yes } }
				mark_as_masters_new_army_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from masters_new_army (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from masters_new_army (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_masters_new_army_member = yes
					FROM = { is_masters_new_army_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_masters_new_army_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.masters_new_army_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from masters_new_army (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - masters_new_army (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_masters_new_army_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - masters_new_army (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - masters_new_army (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_masters_new_army_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - masters_new_army (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes } }
				mark_as_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes } }
				mark_as_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes
					FROM = { is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_mesoamerican_alliance_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.mesoamerican_alliance_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - mesoamerican_alliance (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] the_fire_council (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_the_fire_council_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_the_fire_council_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] the_fire_council (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] the_fire_council (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_the_fire_council_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_the_fire_council_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] the_fire_council (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - the_fire_council (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_the_fire_council_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - the_fire_council (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_the_fire_council_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - the_fire_council (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - the_fire_council (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into the_fire_council (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_the_fire_council_member = yes } }
				mark_as_the_fire_council_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into the_fire_council (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from the_fire_council (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_the_fire_council_member = yes } }
				mark_as_the_fire_council_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from the_fire_council (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from the_fire_council (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_the_fire_council_member = yes
					FROM = { is_the_fire_council_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_the_fire_council_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.the_fire_council_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from the_fire_council (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - the_fire_council (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_the_fire_council_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - the_fire_council (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - the_fire_council (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_the_fire_council_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - the_fire_council (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] mojave_alliance (on_action) entered"

			if = {
				limit = {
					is_mojave_alliance_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_mojave_alliance_member = yes
				}

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] mojave_alliance (on_action) exited"

		}
	}

			if = {

			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_mojave_alliance_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - mojave_alliance (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_mojave_alliance_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - mojave_alliance (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - mojave_alliance (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into mojave_alliance (on_action) entered"

			if = {

				mark_as_mojave_alliance_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into mojave_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from mojave_alliance (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_mojave_alliance_member = yes } }
				mark_as_mojave_alliance_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from mojave_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from mojave_alliance (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_mojave_alliance_member = yes
					FROM = { is_mojave_alliance_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_mojave_alliance_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.mojave_alliance_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from mojave_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - mojave_alliance (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_mojave_alliance_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - mojave_alliance (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - mojave_alliance (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_mojave_alliance_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - mojave_alliance (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] mormon_alliance (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_mormon_alliance_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_mormon_alliance_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] mormon_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

					mark_as_mormon_alliance_member = yes

		}

		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_mormon_alliance_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - mormon_alliance (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_mormon_alliance_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - mormon_alliance (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - mormon_alliance (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into mormon_alliance (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_mormon_alliance_member = yes } }
				mark_as_mormon_alliance_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into mormon_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from mormon_alliance (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_mormon_alliance_member = yes } }
				mark_as_mormon_alliance_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from mormon_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from mormon_alliance (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_mormon_alliance_member = yes
					FROM = { is_mormon_alliance_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_mormon_alliance_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.mormon_alliance_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from mormon_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - mormon_alliance (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_mormon_alliance_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - mormon_alliance (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - mormon_alliance (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_mormon_alliance_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - mormon_alliance (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] nevada_enclave (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_nevada_enclave_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_nevada_enclave_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] nevada_enclave (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] nevada_enclave (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_nevada_enclave_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_nevada_enclave_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] nevada_enclave (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - nevada_enclave (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_nevada_enclave_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - nevada_enclave (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_nevada_enclave_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - nevada_enclave (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - nevada_enclave (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into nevada_enclave (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_nevada_enclave_member = yes } }
				mark_as_nevada_enclave_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into nevada_enclave (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from nevada_enclave (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_nevada_enclave_member = yes } }
				mark_as_nevada_enclave_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from nevada_enclave (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from nevada_enclave (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_nevada_enclave_member = yes
					FROM = { is_nevada_enclave_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_nevada_enclave_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.nevada_enclave_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from nevada_enclave (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - nevada_enclave (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_nevada_enclave_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - nevada_enclave (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - nevada_enclave (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_nevada_enclave_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - nevada_enclave (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] nevada_pact (on_action) entered"

			if = {
				limit = {
					is_nevada_pact_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_nevada_pact_member = yes
				}

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] nevada_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

				if = {

			}
		}
	}

		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_nevada_pact_member = yes } }
				mark_as_nevada_pact_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into nevada_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from nevada_pact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_nevada_pact_member = yes } }
				mark_as_nevada_pact_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from nevada_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from nevada_pact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_nevada_pact_member = yes
					FROM = { is_nevada_pact_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_nevada_pact_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.nevada_pact_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from nevada_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - nevada_pact (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_nevada_pact_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - nevada_pact (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - nevada_pact (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_nevada_pact_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - nevada_pact (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] northern_league (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_northern_league_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_northern_league_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] northern_league (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

				}

		}

				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - northern_league (on_action) entered"

		}
	}

				mark_as_northern_league_member = yes

		}

			if = {

				mark_as_northern_league_member = yes

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from northern_league (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from northern_league (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_northern_league_member = yes
					FROM = { is_northern_league_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_northern_league_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.northern_league_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from northern_league (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - northern_league (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_northern_league_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - northern_league (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - northern_league (on_action) examined"
			}

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - northern_league (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] northern_mojave_pact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] northern_mojave_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] northern_mojave_pact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] northern_mojave_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - northern_mojave_pact (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - northern_mojave_pact (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - northern_mojave_pact (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - northern_mojave_pact (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into northern_mojave_pact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes } }
				mark_as_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into northern_mojave_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from northern_mojave_pact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes } }
				mark_as_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from northern_mojave_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from northern_mojave_pact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes
					FROM = { is_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_northern_mojave_pact_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.northern_mojave_pact_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from northern_mojave_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - northern_mojave_pact (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - northern_mojave_pact (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - northern_mojave_pact (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - northern_mojave_pact (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] phoenix_federation (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_phoenix_federation_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_phoenix_federation_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] phoenix_federation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] phoenix_federation (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_phoenix_federation_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_phoenix_federation_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] phoenix_federation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - phoenix_federation (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_phoenix_federation_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - phoenix_federation (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_phoenix_federation_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - phoenix_federation (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - phoenix_federation (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into phoenix_federation (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_phoenix_federation_member = yes } }
				mark_as_phoenix_federation_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into phoenix_federation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from phoenix_federation (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_phoenix_federation_member = yes } }
				mark_as_phoenix_federation_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from phoenix_federation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from phoenix_federation (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_phoenix_federation_member = yes
					FROM = { is_phoenix_federation_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_phoenix_federation_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.phoenix_federation_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from phoenix_federation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - phoenix_federation (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_phoenix_federation_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - phoenix_federation (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - phoenix_federation (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_phoenix_federation_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - phoenix_federation (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] rio_pact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_rio_pact_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_rio_pact_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] rio_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] rio_pact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_rio_pact_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_rio_pact_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] rio_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - rio_pact (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_rio_pact_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - rio_pact (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_rio_pact_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - rio_pact (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - rio_pact (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into rio_pact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_rio_pact_member = yes } }
				mark_as_rio_pact_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into rio_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from rio_pact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_rio_pact_member = yes } }
				mark_as_rio_pact_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from rio_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from rio_pact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_rio_pact_member = yes
					FROM = { is_rio_pact_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_rio_pact_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.rio_pact_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from rio_pact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - rio_pact (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_rio_pact_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - rio_pact (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - rio_pact (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_rio_pact_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - rio_pact (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] senators_little_helpers (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_senators_little_helpers_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_senators_little_helpers_member = yes
				}
			}

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] senators_little_helpers (on_action) exited"

		}
	}

	on_join_faction = {

		}

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from senators_little_helpers (on_action) exited"
			}
		}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from senators_little_helpers (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_senators_little_helpers_member = yes
					FROM = { is_senators_little_helpers_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_senators_little_helpers_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.senators_little_helpers_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from senators_little_helpers (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - senators_little_helpers (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_senators_little_helpers_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - senators_little_helpers (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - senators_little_helpers (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_senators_little_helpers_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - senators_little_helpers (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] great_confederation (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_great_confederation_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_great_confederation_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] great_confederation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] great_confederation (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_great_confederation_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_great_confederation_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] great_confederation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - great_confederation (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_great_confederation_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - great_confederation (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_great_confederation_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - great_confederation (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - great_confederation (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into great_confederation (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_great_confederation_member = yes } }
				mark_as_great_confederation_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into great_confederation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from great_confederation (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_great_confederation_member = yes } }
				mark_as_great_confederation_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from great_confederation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from great_confederation (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_great_confederation_member = yes
					FROM = { is_great_confederation_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_great_confederation_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.great_confederation_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from great_confederation (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - great_confederation (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_great_confederation_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - great_confederation (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - great_confederation (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_great_confederation_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - great_confederation (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] texan_economic_union (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_texan_economic_union_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_texan_economic_union_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] texan_economic_union (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] texan_economic_union (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_texan_economic_union_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_texan_economic_union_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] texan_economic_union (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - texan_economic_union (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_texan_economic_union_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - texan_economic_union (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_texan_economic_union_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - texan_economic_union (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - texan_economic_union (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into texan_economic_union (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_texan_economic_union_member = yes } }
				mark_as_texan_economic_union_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into texan_economic_union (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from texan_economic_union (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_texan_economic_union_member = yes } }
				mark_as_texan_economic_union_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from texan_economic_union (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from texan_economic_union (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_texan_economic_union_member = yes
					FROM = { is_texan_economic_union_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_texan_economic_union_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.texan_economic_union_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from texan_economic_union (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - texan_economic_union (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_texan_economic_union_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - texan_economic_union (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - texan_economic_union (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_texan_economic_union_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - texan_economic_union (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] unbroken_coast (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_unbroken_coast_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_unbroken_coast_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] unbroken_coast (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] unbroken_coast (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_unbroken_coast_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_unbroken_coast_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] unbroken_coast (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - unbroken_coast (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_unbroken_coast_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - unbroken_coast (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_unbroken_coast_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - unbroken_coast (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - unbroken_coast (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into unbroken_coast (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_unbroken_coast_member = yes } }
				mark_as_unbroken_coast_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into unbroken_coast (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from unbroken_coast (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_unbroken_coast_member = yes } }
				mark_as_unbroken_coast_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from unbroken_coast (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from unbroken_coast (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_unbroken_coast_member = yes
					FROM = { is_unbroken_coast_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_unbroken_coast_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.unbroken_coast_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from unbroken_coast (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - unbroken_coast (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_unbroken_coast_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - unbroken_coast (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - unbroken_coast (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_unbroken_coast_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - unbroken_coast (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] western_enclave (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_western_enclave_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_western_enclave_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] western_enclave (on_action) exited"

		}
	}

		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from western_enclave (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_western_enclave_member = yes } }
				mark_as_western_enclave_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from western_enclave (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from western_enclave (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_western_enclave_member = yes
					FROM = { is_western_enclave_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_western_enclave_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.western_enclave_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from western_enclave (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - western_enclave (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_western_enclave_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - western_enclave (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - western_enclave (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_western_enclave_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - western_enclave (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] order_of_st_joseph (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] order_of_st_joseph (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] order_of_st_joseph (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] order_of_st_joseph (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - order_of_st_joseph (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - order_of_st_joseph (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - order_of_st_joseph (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - order_of_st_joseph (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into order_of_st_joseph (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes } }
				mark_as_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into order_of_st_joseph (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from order_of_st_joseph (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes } }
				mark_as_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from order_of_st_joseph (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from order_of_st_joseph (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes
					FROM = { is_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_order_of_st_joseph_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.order_of_st_joseph_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from order_of_st_joseph (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - order_of_st_joseph (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - order_of_st_joseph (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - order_of_st_joseph (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - order_of_st_joseph (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] breach_ferals (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_breach_ferals_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_breach_ferals_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] breach_ferals (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] breach_ferals (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_breach_ferals_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_breach_ferals_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] breach_ferals (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - breach_ferals (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_breach_ferals_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - breach_ferals (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_breach_ferals_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - breach_ferals (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - breach_ferals (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into breach_ferals (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_breach_ferals_member = yes } }
				mark_as_breach_ferals_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into breach_ferals (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from breach_ferals (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_breach_ferals_member = yes } }
				mark_as_breach_ferals_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from breach_ferals (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from breach_ferals (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_breach_ferals_member = yes
					FROM = { is_breach_ferals_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_breach_ferals_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.breach_ferals_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from breach_ferals (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - breach_ferals (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_breach_ferals_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - breach_ferals (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - breach_ferals (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_breach_ferals_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - breach_ferals (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_offer_join_faction = {

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

				}

		}
	}

		effect = {
			if = {

				mark_as_white_sands_compact_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into white_sands_compact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from white_sands_compact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_white_sands_compact_member = yes } }
				mark_as_white_sands_compact_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from white_sands_compact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from white_sands_compact (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_white_sands_compact_member = yes
					FROM = { is_white_sands_compact_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_white_sands_compact_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.white_sands_compact_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from white_sands_compact (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - white_sands_compact (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_white_sands_compact_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - white_sands_compact (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - white_sands_compact (on_action) examined"

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - white_sands_compact (on_action) finished exam"
			}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] cartel_faction (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_cartel_faction_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_cartel_faction_member = yes
				}

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] cartel_faction (on_action) exited"

	}

				mark_as_cartel_faction_member = yes
