				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into cartel_faction (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from cartel_faction (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_cartel_faction_member = yes } }
				mark_as_cartel_faction_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from cartel_faction (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from cartel_faction (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_cartel_faction_member = yes
					FROM = { is_cartel_faction_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_cartel_faction_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.cartel_faction_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from cartel_faction (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - cartel_faction (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_cartel_faction_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - cartel_faction (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - cartel_faction (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_cartel_faction_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - cartel_faction (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] cascadia_pirates (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_cascadia_pirates_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_cascadia_pirates_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] cascadia_pirates (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] cascadia_pirates (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_cascadia_pirates_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_cascadia_pirates_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] cascadia_pirates (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - cascadia_pirates (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_cascadia_pirates_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - cascadia_pirates (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_cascadia_pirates_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - cascadia_pirates (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - cascadia_pirates (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into cascadia_pirates (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_cascadia_pirates_member = yes } }
				mark_as_cascadia_pirates_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into cascadia_pirates (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from cascadia_pirates (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_cascadia_pirates_member = yes } }
				mark_as_cascadia_pirates_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from cascadia_pirates (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from cascadia_pirates (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_cascadia_pirates_member = yes
					FROM = { is_cascadia_pirates_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_cascadia_pirates_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.cascadia_pirates_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from cascadia_pirates (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - cascadia_pirates (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_cascadia_pirates_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - cascadia_pirates (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - cascadia_pirates (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_cascadia_pirates_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - cascadia_pirates (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] transcascadia_republic (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_transcascadia_republic_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_transcascadia_republic_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] transcascadia_republic (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] transcascadia_republic (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_transcascadia_republic_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_transcascadia_republic_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] transcascadia_republic (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - transcascadia_republic (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_transcascadia_republic_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - transcascadia_republic (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_transcascadia_republic_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - transcascadia_republic (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - transcascadia_republic (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into transcascadia_republic (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_transcascadia_republic_member = yes } }
				mark_as_transcascadia_republic_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into transcascadia_republic (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from transcascadia_republic (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_transcascadia_republic_member = yes } }
				mark_as_transcascadia_republic_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from transcascadia_republic (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from transcascadia_republic (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_transcascadia_republic_member = yes
					FROM = { is_transcascadia_republic_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_transcascadia_republic_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.transcascadia_republic_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from transcascadia_republic (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - transcascadia_republic (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_transcascadia_republic_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - transcascadia_republic (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - transcascadia_republic (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_transcascadia_republic_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - transcascadia_republic (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] new_california (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_new_california_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_new_california_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] new_california (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] new_california (on_action) entered"

				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_new_california_member = yes
				}
			}

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] new_california (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - new_california (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_new_california_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - new_california (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_new_california_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - new_california (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - new_california (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into new_california (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_new_california_member = yes } }
				mark_as_new_california_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into new_california (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from new_california (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_new_california_member = yes } }
				mark_as_new_california_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from new_california (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from new_california (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_new_california_member = yes
					FROM = { is_new_california_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_new_california_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.new_california_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from new_california (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - new_california (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_new_california_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - new_california (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - new_california (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_new_california_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - new_california (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] the_second_coalition (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_the_second_coalition_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_the_second_coalition_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] the_second_coalition (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] the_second_coalition (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_the_second_coalition_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_the_second_coalition_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] the_second_coalition (on_action) exited"

		}
	}

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			}

				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - the_second_coalition (on_action) entered"
				}

				if = {

					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - the_second_coalition (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - the_second_coalition (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into the_second_coalition (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_the_second_coalition_member = yes } }
				mark_as_the_second_coalition_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into the_second_coalition (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from the_second_coalition (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_the_second_coalition_member = yes } }
				mark_as_the_second_coalition_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from the_second_coalition (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from the_second_coalition (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_the_second_coalition_member = yes
					FROM = { is_the_second_coalition_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_the_second_coalition_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.the_second_coalition_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from the_second_coalition (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - the_second_coalition (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_the_second_coalition_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - the_second_coalition (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - the_second_coalition (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_the_second_coalition_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - the_second_coalition (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] imperium_mexicanum (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] imperium_mexicanum (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] imperium_mexicanum (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] imperium_mexicanum (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - imperium_mexicanum (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - imperium_mexicanum (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - imperium_mexicanum (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - imperium_mexicanum (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into imperium_mexicanum (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes } }
				mark_as_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into imperium_mexicanum (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from imperium_mexicanum (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes } }
				mark_as_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from imperium_mexicanum (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from imperium_mexicanum (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes
					FROM = { is_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_imperium_mexicanum_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.imperium_mexicanum_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from imperium_mexicanum (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - imperium_mexicanum (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - imperium_mexicanum (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - imperium_mexicanum (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - imperium_mexicanum (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] mexican_league (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_mexican_league_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_mexican_league_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] mexican_league (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] mexican_league (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_mexican_league_member = yes
				}

			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - mexican_league (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_mexican_league_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - mexican_league (on_action) entered"
				}

				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - mexican_league (on_action) exited"

				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - mexican_league (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into mexican_league (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_mexican_league_member = yes } }
				mark_as_mexican_league_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into mexican_league (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from mexican_league (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_mexican_league_member = yes } }
				mark_as_mexican_league_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from mexican_league (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from mexican_league (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_mexican_league_member = yes
					FROM = { is_mexican_league_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_mexican_league_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.mexican_league_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from mexican_league (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - mexican_league (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_mexican_league_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - mexican_league (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - mexican_league (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_mexican_league_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - mexican_league (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			if = {

					is_midnight_union_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_midnight_union_member = yes
				}
			}

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] midnight_union (on_action) exited"

		}

		effect = {

				mark_as_midnight_union_member = yes

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from midnight_union (on_action) exited"

		}

	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from midnight_union (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_midnight_union_member = yes
					FROM = { is_midnight_union_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_midnight_union_leader = FROM }

				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from midnight_union (on_action) exited"

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into big_circle (on_action) exited"
			}
		}

		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from big_circle (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_big_circle_member = yes } }
				mark_as_big_circle_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from big_circle (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from big_circle (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_big_circle_member = yes
					FROM = { is_big_circle_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_big_circle_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.big_circle_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from big_circle (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - big_circle (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_big_circle_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - big_circle (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - big_circle (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_big_circle_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - big_circle (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] dharma_way (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_dharma_way_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_dharma_way_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] dharma_way (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] dharma_way (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_dharma_way_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_dharma_way_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] dharma_way (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - dharma_way (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_dharma_way_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - dharma_way (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_dharma_way_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - dharma_way (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - dharma_way (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into dharma_way (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_dharma_way_member = yes } }
				mark_as_dharma_way_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into dharma_way (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from dharma_way (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_dharma_way_member = yes } }
				mark_as_dharma_way_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from dharma_way (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from dharma_way (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_dharma_way_member = yes
					FROM = { is_dharma_way_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_dharma_way_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.dharma_way_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from dharma_way (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - dharma_way (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_dharma_way_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - dharma_way (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - dharma_way (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_dharma_way_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - dharma_way (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] californian_hegemony (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_californian_hegemony_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_californian_hegemony_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] californian_hegemony (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

				}

				if = {

			}
		}
	}

		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

				mark_as_californian_hegemony_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into californian_hegemony (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from californian_hegemony (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_californian_hegemony_member = yes } }
				mark_as_californian_hegemony_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from californian_hegemony (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from californian_hegemony (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_californian_hegemony_member = yes
					FROM = { is_californian_hegemony_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_californian_hegemony_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.californian_hegemony_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from californian_hegemony (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - californian_hegemony (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_californian_hegemony_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - californian_hegemony (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - californian_hegemony (on_action) examined"

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - californian_hegemony (on_action) finished exam"

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			if = {

				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_northern_congress_member = yes
				}

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into road_warriors (on_action) exited"

		}

		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from road_warriors (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_road_warriors_member = yes } }
				mark_as_road_warriors_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from road_warriors (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from road_warriors (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_road_warriors_member = yes
					FROM = { is_road_warriors_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_road_warriors_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.road_warriors_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from road_warriors (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - road_warriors (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_road_warriors_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - road_warriors (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - road_warriors (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_road_warriors_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - road_warriors (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] synergy_alliance (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_synergy_alliance_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_synergy_alliance_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] synergy_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] synergy_alliance (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_synergy_alliance_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_synergy_alliance_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] synergy_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - synergy_alliance (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_synergy_alliance_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - synergy_alliance (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_synergy_alliance_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - synergy_alliance (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - synergy_alliance (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into synergy_alliance (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_synergy_alliance_member = yes } }
				mark_as_synergy_alliance_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into synergy_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from synergy_alliance (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_synergy_alliance_member = yes } }
				mark_as_synergy_alliance_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from synergy_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from synergy_alliance (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_synergy_alliance_member = yes
					FROM = { is_synergy_alliance_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_synergy_alliance_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.synergy_alliance_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from synergy_alliance (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - synergy_alliance (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_synergy_alliance_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - synergy_alliance (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - synergy_alliance (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_synergy_alliance_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - synergy_alliance (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] vulpes_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_vulpes_legion_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_vulpes_legion_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] vulpes_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			if = {

					is_vulpes_legion_member = yes
				}

					mark_as_vulpes_legion_member = yes

			}
		}
	}

				mark_as_vulpes_legion_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into vulpes_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from vulpes_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_vulpes_legion_member = yes } }
				mark_as_vulpes_legion_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from vulpes_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from vulpes_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_vulpes_legion_member = yes
					FROM = { is_vulpes_legion_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_vulpes_legion_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.vulpes_legion_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from vulpes_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - vulpes_legion (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_vulpes_legion_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - vulpes_legion (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - vulpes_legion (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_vulpes_legion_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - vulpes_legion (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_aurelius_legion_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_aurelius_legion_member = yes

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] aurelius_legion (on_action) exited"

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - aurelius_legion (on_action) finished exam"

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - aurelius_legion (on_action) finished exam"

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into lanius_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_lanius_legion_member = yes } }
				mark_as_lanius_legion_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into lanius_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from lanius_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_lanius_legion_member = yes } }
				mark_as_lanius_legion_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from lanius_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from lanius_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_lanius_legion_member = yes
					FROM = { is_lanius_legion_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_lanius_legion_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.lanius_legion_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from lanius_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - lanius_legion (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_lanius_legion_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - lanius_legion (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - lanius_legion (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_lanius_legion_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - lanius_legion (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] hades_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_hades_legion_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_hades_legion_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] hades_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] hades_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_hades_legion_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_hades_legion_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] hades_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - hades_legion (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_hades_legion_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - hades_legion (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_hades_legion_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - hades_legion (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - hades_legion (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into hades_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_hades_legion_member = yes } }
				mark_as_hades_legion_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into hades_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from hades_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_hades_legion_member = yes } }
				mark_as_hades_legion_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from hades_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from hades_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_hades_legion_member = yes
					FROM = { is_hades_legion_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_hades_legion_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.hades_legion_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from hades_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - hades_legion (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_hades_legion_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - hades_legion (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - hades_legion (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_hades_legion_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - hades_legion (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] lucius_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_lucius_legion_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_lucius_legion_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] lucius_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] lucius_legion (on_action) entered"

			if = {
				limit = {
					is_lucius_legion_member = yes
				}

					mark_as_lucius_legion_member = yes

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] lucius_legion (on_action) exited"

				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - lucius_legion (on_action) entered"

		}
	}

				limit = { FROM = { is_lucius_legion_member = yes } }
				mark_as_lucius_legion_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into lucius_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from lucius_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_lucius_legion_member = yes } }
				mark_as_lucius_legion_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from lucius_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from lucius_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_lucius_legion_member = yes
					FROM = { is_lucius_legion_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_lucius_legion_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.lucius_legion_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from lucius_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - lucius_legion (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_lucius_legion_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - lucius_legion (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - lucius_legion (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_lucius_legion_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - lucius_legion (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] malpais_legion (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_malpais_legion_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_malpais_legion_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] malpais_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

		}

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from malpais_legion (on_action) entered"

				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from malpais_legion (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - malpais_legion (on_action) examined"

			if = {

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - malpais_legion (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - malpais_legion (on_action) examined"

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - malpais_legion (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] northern_union (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_northern_union_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_northern_union_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] northern_union (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] northern_union (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_northern_union_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_northern_union_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] northern_union (on_action) exited"
			}
		}

		effect = {
			if = {

				if = {

					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - northern_union (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_northern_union_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - northern_union (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - northern_union (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into northern_union (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_northern_union_member = yes } }
				mark_as_northern_union_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into northern_union (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from northern_union (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_northern_union_member = yes } }
				mark_as_northern_union_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from northern_union (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from northern_union (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_northern_union_member = yes
					FROM = { is_northern_union_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_northern_union_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.northern_union_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from northern_union (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - northern_union (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_northern_union_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - northern_union (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - northern_union (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_northern_union_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - northern_union (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] bloody_electorals (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_bloody_electorals_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_bloody_electorals_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] bloody_electorals (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] bloody_electorals (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_bloody_electorals_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_bloody_electorals_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] bloody_electorals (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - bloody_electorals (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_bloody_electorals_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - bloody_electorals (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_bloody_electorals_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - bloody_electorals (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - bloody_electorals (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into bloody_electorals (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_bloody_electorals_member = yes } }
				mark_as_bloody_electorals_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into bloody_electorals (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from bloody_electorals (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_bloody_electorals_member = yes } }
				mark_as_bloody_electorals_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from bloody_electorals (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from bloody_electorals (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_bloody_electorals_member = yes
					FROM = { is_bloody_electorals_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_bloody_electorals_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.bloody_electorals_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from bloody_electorals (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - bloody_electorals (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_bloody_electorals_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - bloody_electorals (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - bloody_electorals (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_bloody_electorals_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - bloody_electorals (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] canadian_watchdogs (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] canadian_watchdogs (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] canadian_watchdogs (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] canadian_watchdogs (on_action) exited"

		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			}
			if = {

				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - canadian_watchdogs (on_action) entered"

				if = {

					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - canadian_watchdogs (on_action) exited"
				}
