			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - canadian_watchdogs (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into canadian_watchdogs (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes } }
				mark_as_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into canadian_watchdogs (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from canadian_watchdogs (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes } }
				mark_as_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from canadian_watchdogs (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from canadian_watchdogs (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes
					FROM = { is_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_canadian_watchdogs_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.canadian_watchdogs_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from canadian_watchdogs (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - canadian_watchdogs (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - canadian_watchdogs (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - canadian_watchdogs (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - canadian_watchdogs (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] kingdom_of_manitoba (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] kingdom_of_manitoba (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_join_faction = {

				mark_as_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into kingdom_of_manitoba (on_action) exited"

	on_release_as_puppet = {

				mark_as_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from kingdom_of_manitoba (on_action) exited"

		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from kingdom_of_manitoba (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes
					FROM = { is_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes }
				}

				set_variable = { GLOBAL.kingdom_of_manitoba_leader = ROOT }

				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from kingdom_of_manitoba (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - kingdom_of_manitoba (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - kingdom_of_manitoba (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - kingdom_of_manitoba (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] united_wallers (on_action) entered"

				}

					mark_as_united_wallers_member = yes
				}

				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] united_wallers (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] united_wallers (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - united_wallers (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_united_wallers_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - united_wallers (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_united_wallers_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - united_wallers (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - united_wallers (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into united_wallers (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_united_wallers_member = yes } }
				mark_as_united_wallers_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into united_wallers (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from united_wallers (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_united_wallers_member = yes } }
				mark_as_united_wallers_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from united_wallers (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from united_wallers (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_united_wallers_member = yes
					FROM = { is_united_wallers_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_united_wallers_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.united_wallers_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from united_wallers (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - united_wallers (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_united_wallers_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - united_wallers (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - united_wallers (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_united_wallers_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - united_wallers (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] montana_enclave (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_montana_enclave_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_montana_enclave_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] montana_enclave (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] montana_enclave (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_montana_enclave_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_montana_enclave_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] montana_enclave (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - montana_enclave (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_montana_enclave_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - montana_enclave (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_montana_enclave_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - montana_enclave (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - montana_enclave (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into montana_enclave (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_montana_enclave_member = yes } }
				mark_as_montana_enclave_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into montana_enclave (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from montana_enclave (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_montana_enclave_member = yes } }
				mark_as_montana_enclave_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from montana_enclave (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from montana_enclave (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_montana_enclave_member = yes
					FROM = { is_montana_enclave_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_montana_enclave_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.montana_enclave_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from montana_enclave (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - montana_enclave (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_montana_enclave_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - montana_enclave (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - montana_enclave (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_montana_enclave_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - montana_enclave (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] northern_winds (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_northern_winds_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_northern_winds_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] northern_winds (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] northern_winds (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_northern_winds_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_northern_winds_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] northern_winds (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - northern_winds (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_northern_winds_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - northern_winds (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_northern_winds_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - northern_winds (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - northern_winds (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into northern_winds (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_northern_winds_member = yes } }
				mark_as_northern_winds_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into northern_winds (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from northern_winds (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_northern_winds_member = yes } }
				mark_as_northern_winds_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from northern_winds (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from northern_winds (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_northern_winds_member = yes
					FROM = { is_northern_winds_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_northern_winds_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.northern_winds_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from northern_winds (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - northern_winds (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_northern_winds_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - northern_winds (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - northern_winds (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_northern_winds_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - northern_winds (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			if = {

					is_allied_states_member = yes
				}

					mark_as_allied_states_member = yes
				}

				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from allied_states (on_action) entered"
			}

				limit = {
					is_allied_states_member = yes

				}

			}

				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from allied_states (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {

				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - allied_states (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - allied_states (on_action) examined"

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - allied_states (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] fifth_world (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_fifth_world_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_fifth_world_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] fifth_world (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] fifth_world (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_fifth_world_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_fifth_world_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] fifth_world (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - fifth_world (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_fifth_world_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - fifth_world (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_fifth_world_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - fifth_world (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - fifth_world (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into fifth_world (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_fifth_world_member = yes } }
				mark_as_fifth_world_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into fifth_world (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from fifth_world (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_fifth_world_member = yes } }
				mark_as_fifth_world_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from fifth_world (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from fifth_world (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_fifth_world_member = yes
					FROM = { is_fifth_world_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_fifth_world_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.fifth_world_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from fifth_world (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - fifth_world (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_fifth_world_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - fifth_world (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - fifth_world (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_fifth_world_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - fifth_world (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] red_shield (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_red_shield_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_red_shield_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] red_shield (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] red_shield (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_red_shield_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_red_shield_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] red_shield (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - red_shield (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_red_shield_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - red_shield (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_red_shield_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - red_shield (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - red_shield (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into red_shield (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_red_shield_member = yes } }
				mark_as_red_shield_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into red_shield (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from red_shield (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_red_shield_member = yes } }
				mark_as_red_shield_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from red_shield (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from red_shield (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_red_shield_member = yes
					FROM = { is_red_shield_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_red_shield_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.red_shield_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from red_shield (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - red_shield (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_red_shield_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - red_shield (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - red_shield (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_red_shield_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - red_shield (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] wardens_of_white (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_wardens_of_white_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_wardens_of_white_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] wardens_of_white (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] wardens_of_white (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_wardens_of_white_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_wardens_of_white_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] wardens_of_white (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - wardens_of_white (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {

				if = {

					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - wardens_of_white (on_action) entered"

				if = {

					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - wardens_of_white (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - wardens_of_white (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into wardens_of_white (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_wardens_of_white_member = yes } }
				mark_as_wardens_of_white_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into wardens_of_white (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from wardens_of_white (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_wardens_of_white_member = yes } }
				mark_as_wardens_of_white_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from wardens_of_white (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from wardens_of_white (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_wardens_of_white_member = yes
					FROM = { is_wardens_of_white_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_wardens_of_white_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.wardens_of_white_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from wardens_of_white (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - wardens_of_white (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_wardens_of_white_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - wardens_of_white (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - wardens_of_white (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_wardens_of_white_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - wardens_of_white (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

on_actions = {
	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] miscounts (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_miscounts_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_miscounts_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] miscounts (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {

		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from miscounts (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {

				mark_as_miscounts_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from miscounts (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from miscounts (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_miscounts_member = yes
					FROM = { is_miscounts_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_miscounts_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.miscounts_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from miscounts (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - miscounts (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_miscounts_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - miscounts (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - miscounts (on_action) examined"

			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - miscounts (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the country invited
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] royal_accord (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_royal_accord_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_royal_accord_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_offer_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] royal_accord (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is faction leader on join faction requests
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] royal_accord (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_royal_accord_member = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					mark_as_royal_accord_member = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_join_faction to [FROM.GetName] royal_accord (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - royal_accord (on_action) examined"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_royal_accord_member = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - royal_accord (on_action) entered"
				}
				unmark_as_royal_accord_member = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - royal_accord (on_action) exited"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_leave_faction - royal_accord (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into royal_accord (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_royal_accord_member = yes } }
				mark_as_royal_accord_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_puppet [FROM.GetName] into royal_accord (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_on_puppet [FROM.GetName] from royal_accord (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_royal_accord_member = yes } }
				mark_as_royal_accord_member = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_puppet [FROM.GetName] from royal_accord (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is the new faction leader FROM is the old faction leader
	# This does not work with the other code, so it should never be called
	on_assume_faction_leadership = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from royal_accord (on_action) entered"
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_royal_accord_member = yes
					FROM = { is_royal_accord_member = yes }
				}
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.last_royal_accord_leader = FROM }
				set_variable = { GLOBAL.royal_accord_leader = ROOT }
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
					log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] NOT IN SAME FACTION!"
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_assume_faction_leadership [FROM.GetName] from royal_accord (on_action) exited"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_release_as_free = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - royal_accord (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_royal_accord_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_release_as_free - royal_accord (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is free nation FROM is releaser
	on_liberate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - royal_accord (on_action) examined"
			}
			unmark_as_royal_accord_member = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
				log = "[GetDateText]: [ROOT.GetName] on_liberate - royal_accord (on_action) finished exam"
			}
		}
	}
}
# vim: set ft=pdx ts=2 sw=2 tw=79 :
